content:
Hi Giorgio,
@Giorgio Cangioli My name is Anu and I am from NIH. I am also co-chair of the HRPO working group at RDA. I was trying to access the registration page and am not able to find it. Can you provide a link?

Dear Anu.
I'm Alicia Mart√≠nez, I work in SAS with Celia (other co-chair of the HRPO working group at RDA).
Here you are the link: http://www.hl7.org/events/fhir/connectathon/2021/01/
At you disposal if you need more information.
Thanks, Alicia. I apologize for creating a separate topic: still getting used to Zulip :smile:
Is it possible to provide this link from the Confluence page?
'FAIRness for FHIR' project | FHIR4FAIR Implementation Guide: https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=91991234
Thanks, all of this is useful. Is the connectathon registration for individuals or teams?
